acceptTerms: I accept the terms and conditions
title: By submitting your information, you agree to the following terms and conditions:
b1: You confirm that all information provided is true, accurate, and complete to the best of your knowledge.
b2: You understand that providing false or misleading information may lead to legal consequences and/or result in the rejection of your application.
b3: You recognize that the information you provide may be used for verification, and any discrepancies could cause delays or result in the rejection of your application.
b4: You agree to indemnify and hold harmless all parties involved in processing your application, including the website owner, from any damages, losses, or liabilities that may arise from any inaccurate or incomplete information you provide.
b5: You consent to the website owner using your information to provide you with services or products.
b6: You acknowledge that the website owner has the right to change these terms and conditions at any time without prior notice.
b7: You agree to comply with all relevant laws and regulations in the Kingdom of Bahrain when submitting your information.
b8: By submitting the application, you agree to comply with the rules and decisions set forth by the Isa bin Salman Education Charitable Trust regarding your application.
